slice-stream2
=============

> Pipe data through a stream until some fixed length is reached.

[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/slice-stream2.svg)](http://badge.fury.io/js/slice-stream2)
[![dependencies](https://david-dm.org/jviotti/slice-stream2.svg)](https://david-dm.org/jviotti/slice-stream2.svg)
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jviotti/slice-stream2.png)](https://travis-ci.org/jviotti/slice-stream2)
[![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/00512q0em47rps6t/branch/master?svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/resin-io/slice-stream2/branch/master)

Installation
------------

```bash
$ npm install --save slice-stream2
```

Example
-------

```js
var fs = require('fs');
var sliceStream = require('slice-stream2');

fs.createReadStream('my/file.txt')
  .pipe(sliceStream({ bytes: 5 }))
  .pipe(process.stdout);
```
